source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_ProductMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'ProductMasterLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'ProductMasterLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'ProductPackageCrosswalk' AS B_CLASSNAME,
NEWID() AS PRODUCT_PKG_CROSSWALK_ID,
PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
PRODUCT_TYPE,
PACKAGE_SOURCE_ID,
F_PRODUCT_ID,
F_PACKAGE_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE
FROM SA_PRODUCT_PACKAGE_CROSSWALK

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'ProductKitCrosswalk' AS B_CLASSNAME,
NEWID() AS PRODUCT_KIT_CROSSWALK_ID,
PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
PRODUCT_TYPE,
KIT_SOURCE_ID,
F_PRODUCT_MAIN_ID,
F_KIT_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE
FROM SA_PRODUCT_KIT_CROSSWALK

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT EmailAddress AS RAW_EMAIL_ADDRESS,
CAST(OptedIn as bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
EmailCommunicationId AS EMAIL_COMMUNICATION_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[IncrementalLoadCommPrefEmail] WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT PhoneNumber AS RAW_PHONE_NUMBER,
CAST(OptedIn AS Bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
PhoneCommunicationId AS PHONE_COMM_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[IncrementalLoadCommPrefPhone] WITH(NOLOCK)

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

select globalId,
customerContact,
opt_in,
opt_in_type,
sourceSystem,
dtec,
contactType
from [Masterdata_CDP].[cdp_customer_preferences] WITH(NOLOCK)

select CustomerKey,
EmailAddress,
EmailChannelOptOutFlag,
EmailChannelOptStatusDate,
DSG_Brand_Flag,
EAGR_Brand_Flag
from [Masterdata_CDP].[OptOut] WITH(NOLOCK)

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT EmailAddress AS RAW_EMAIL_ADDRESS,
CAST(OptedIn as bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
EmailCommunicationId AS EMAIL_COMMUNICATION_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefEmail] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ChunkNumber = @{activity('Get_Email_Chunk').output.firstRow.ChunkNumber} and TableName = '@{activity('Get_Email_Chunk').output.firstRow.TableName}' and Organization = '@{activity('Get_Email_Chunk').output.firstRow.Organization}' and channel = 'email'

SELECT PhoneNumber AS RAW_PHONE_NUMBER,
CAST(OptedIn AS Bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
PhoneCommunicationId AS PHONE_COMM_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefPhone] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ChunkNumber = @{activity('Get_Phone_Chunk').output.firstRow.ChunkNumber} and TableName = '@{activity('Get_Phone_Chunk').output.firstRow.TableName}' and Organization = '@{activity('Get_Phone_Chunk').output.firstRow.Organization}' and channel = 'SMS'

Source is Crosswalk DU Table Data

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(customerMasterId) as MAX_ID FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[AllSourceCustomers] WITH(NOLOCK)

ErrorMsg.value: No RAW Data Available For AllSourceCustomers

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWFIRSTNAME,
RAWMIDDLENAME,
RAWLASTNAME,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
DO_NOT_SELL 
FROM Masterdata_CDP.RetailCustomersIncremental 
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWEMAILADDRESS,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.EmailAddressesIncremental 
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWPHONENUMBER,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.PhoneNumbersIncremental
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWSTREETADDRESS,
RAWADDRESSLINE2,
RAWCITY,
RAWSTATEORPROVINCECODE,
RAWZIPOSTALCODE,
RAWCOUNTRYCODE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.AddressLocationsIncremental
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

DELETE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[AllSourceCustomers] where customerMasterId<=@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID} ;
SELECT 1 as success;

SELECT
B_SOURCEID,
RAWFIRSTNAME,
RAWMIDDLENAME,
RAWLASTNAME,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_CREATOR AS B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDATE
FROM Masterdata_CDP.RetailCustomerInitialLoad WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT 
B_SOURCEID,
RAWPHONENUMBER,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_CREATOR AS B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.PhoneNumbersInitialLoad WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT 
B_SOURCEID,
RAWEMAILADDRESS,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_CREATOR AS B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.EmailAddressesInitialLoad WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT 
B_SOURCEID,
RAWSTREETADDRESS,
RAWADDRESSLINE2,
RAWCITY,
RAWSTATEORPROVINCECODE,
RAWZIPOSTALCODE,
RAWCOUNTRYCODE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_CREATOR AS B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.AddressLocationsInitialLoad WITH(NOLOCK)

@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT

,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailCustomerLoad'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[EXT_REF_COUNTRY_ID]
       ,'ExternalRefCountry' as B_CLASSNAME
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE_A2]
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE_A3]
      ,[COUNTRY_NAME]
      ,[COUNTRY_LOCAL_NAME]
      ,[COUNTRY_UN_CODE]
  FROM [ISO].[countrycode]

EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'ExternalRefUSStateLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'External Ref US State Load'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,'ExternalRefUSState' as B_CLASSNAME
      ,[EXT_REF_US_STATE_ID]
      ,[STATE_CODE]
      ,[STATE_NAME]
  FROM [ISO].[statecode]

activities.name: IncrementalSiteMainView
activities.description: select all data from DACJSONLoadSiteMain view

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
B_PUBID,
B_SOURCEID,
'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME,
SITE_NAME,
SITE_TYPE,CAST(IS_Active as bit) IS_Active,
SITE_DESCRIPTION,
OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
ADDRESS_LINE1 ,
ADDRESS_LINE2 ,
CITY ,
STATE_CODE ,
POSTAL_CODE ,
COUNTRY_CODE ,
RAW_MAIN_PHONE ,
RAW_FAX 
from Retail.DACIncrementalSiteMain

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
NEWID() AS SITE_CONTENT_ID,
'SiteContent' AS B_CLASSNAME,
CONTENT_CATEGORY,
CONTENT_TYPE,
CONVERT(nvarchar(128),[CONTENT_SHORT_TEXT]) AS [CONTENT_SHORT_TEXT],
CONTENT_LONG_TEXT,
CONTENT_LANGUAGE,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN
from Retail.DACIncrementalSiteContent

select 
NEWID() AS SITE_DEFAULT_HOURS_ID,
'SiteDefaultHours' AS B_CLASSNAME,
SITE_HOURS_TYPE,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN
from Retail.DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours

WITH CTE AS(

SELECT OWNER_NAME,
OWNER_ADDRESS,
OWNER_CITY,
OWNER_STATE,
OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
COUNTRY_CODE,
B_SOURCE_ID,
--ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY B_SOURCE_ID ORDER BY OWNER_NAME,OWNER_ADDRESS DESC) AS RNK
rank() over(partition by B_Source_ID order by ltrim(rtrim(OWNER_NAME))) as rnk
FROM  [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteOwner]
)
SELECT  DISTINCT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,
      [OWNER_NAME] AS OWNER_NAME
      ,[OWNER_ADDRESS] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[OWNER_CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[OWNER_STATE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[OWNER_POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
	,'INITIALLOAD' as [B_PUBID]
	,'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME
	, B_Source_ID AS [B_SOURCEID]
       ,Country_Code as RAWCOUNTRY_CODE FROM CTE WHERE RNK=1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'Site Master Load'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
      @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[SITE_NAME] AS SITE_NAME
      ,[SITE_TYPE] AS SITE_TYPE
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) as ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION] AS SITE_DESCRIPTION
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] AS SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID] AS B_SOURCEID
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE2] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE2
      ,[CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[STATE_CODE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE] AS RAWCOUNTRY_CODE
	  ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CAST(OPERATIONS_START_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_START_DATE
      ,CAST(CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE
      ,CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
	,FS_SITE_OWNER as [FS_SITE_OWNER]
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
	,FP_WAREHOUSE_PARENT as [FP_WAREHOUSE_PARENT]
	,FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT AS [FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMain]    
WHERE FS_SITE_OWNER IS NOT NULL AND COUNTRY_CODE in ('USA','United States') AND [B_SOURCE_ID] IS NOT NULL

SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) AS ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION]
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE]
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1]
      ,[CITY]
      ,[STATE_CODE]
      ,[POSTAL_CODE]
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CASE WHEN OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA='?' THEN NULL ELSE  CONVERT(decimal(16,4),  convert(float,replace([OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],',','') )) 
	  END AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA
      ,[FS_SITE_OWNER]
	  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMainRDC] WHERE RNK=1

SELECT   @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
       ,FP_SITE_MAIN
      ,NEWID() AS [Site_Contact_ID]
      ,[CONTACT_FIRST_NAME]
      ,[CONTACT_LAST_NAME]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_EMAIL]
      ,[SITE_CONTACT_TYPE]
      ,[FS_SITE_MAIN]
	,'SiteContact' as B_CLASSNAME
FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteContact]

Source.value: Source is US Postal Code Files
Source is Canada Postal Code Files

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT MAX(dtec) AS MaxDate FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[cdp_customer_preferences_archive] WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT MAX(EmailChannelOptStatusDate) AS MaxDate FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[OptOut_archive] WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CDPCustomerPreferencesCount FROM EDME_DataFactory.cdp_customer_preferences with(nolock) where dtec<>'null.null' and dtec>'@{activity('Cdp_Customer_Preferences_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'
SELECT COUNT(1) AS OptOutCount FROM EDME_DataFactory.OptOut with(nolock) where EmailChannelOptStatusDate>'@{activity('OptOut_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

select CustomerKey,
EmailAddress,
EmailChannelOptOutFlag,
EmailChannelOptStatusDate,
DSG_Brand_Flag,
EAGR_Brand_Flag
from EDME_DataFactory.OptOut WITH(NOLOCK)
where EmailChannelOptStatusDate >'@{activity('OptOut_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

select globalId,
customerContact,
opt_in,
opt_in_type,
sourceSystem,
dtec,
contactType 
from EDME_DataFactory.cdp_customer_preferences WITH(NOLOCK) where dtec<>'null.null'

select CustomerKey,
EmailAddress,
EmailChannelOptOutFlag,
EmailChannelOptStatusDate,
DSG_Brand_Flag,
EAGR_Brand_Flag
from EDME_DataFactory.OptOut WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT MAX(LasteTriggerDateTime) AS LasteTriggerDateTime FROM Audit.ADFRetailCustomerWatermark WITH(NOLOCK)

UPDATE Audit.ADFRetailCustomerWatermark SET LasteTriggerDateTime='@{formatDateTime(variables('ToDateTime'),'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}';
select 1 as success;
